titles.title: Judicial Travel Accountability Act
To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require more detailed travel disclosure filings from judicial officers, and for other purposes.
Judicial Travel Accountability Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Judicial Travel Accountability Act
This bill requires a judicial officer to annually disclose (1) the source, description, and value of certain gifts; (2) a detailed description of meetings and events attended, including the names of other known attendees; and (3) total expenses for transportation, lodging, and meals.
